verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came again unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הִנָּבֵא֙ <WH5012> prophesy וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> and say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הֵילִ֖ילוּ <WH3213> Howl הָ֥הּ <WH1929> ye Woe worth לַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> the day

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for קָר֣וֹב <WH7138> [is] near י֔וֹם <WH3117> For the day וְקָר֥וֹב <WH7138> [is] near י֖וֹם <WH3117> even the day לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD י֣וֹם <WH3117> day עָנָ֔ן <WH6051> a cloudy עֵ֥ת <WH6256> it shall be the time גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the heathen יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

וּבָאָ֥ה <WH935> shall come חֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> And the sword בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> upon Egypt וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become חַלְחָלָה֙ <WH2479> and great pain בְּכ֔וּשׁ <WH3568> shall be in Ethiopia בִּנְפֹ֥ל <WH5307> shall fall חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> when the slain בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וְלָקְח֣וּ <WH3947> and they shall take away הֲמוֹנָ֔הּ <WH1995> her multitude וְנֶהֶרְס֖וּ <WH2040> shall be broken down יְסוֹדֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3247> and her foundations

כּ֣וּשׁ <WH3568> Ethiopia וּפ֤וּט <WH6316> and Libya וְלוּד֙ <WH3865> and Lydia וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעֶ֣רֶב <WH6154> Arabia וְכ֔וּב <WH3552> people and Chub וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> and the men אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land הַבְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> that is in league אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> by בַּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> with them by the sword יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> shall fall פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וְנָֽפְלוּ֙ <WH5307> shall fall סֹמְכֵ֣י <WH5564> They also that uphold מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> Egypt וְיָרַ֖ד <WH3381> shall come down גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> and the pride עֻזָּ֑הּ <WH5797> of her power מִמִּגְדֹּ֣ל <WH4024> from the tower סְוֵנֵ֗ה <WH5482> of Syene בַּחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> in it by the sword יִפְּלוּ־ <WH5307> shall they fall בָ֔הּ נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְנָשַׁ֕מּוּ <WH8074> And they shall be desolate בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst אֲרָצ֣וֹת <WH776> of the countries נְשַׁמּ֑וֹת <WH8074> [that are] desolate וְעָרָ֕יו <WH5892> and her cities בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> shall be in the midst עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> of the cities נַחֲרָב֖וֹת <WH2717> [that are] wasted תִּֽהְיֶֽינָה׃ <WH1961> become

וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> And they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּי־ <WH5414> when I have set אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וְנִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <WH7665> shall be destroyed כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עֹזְרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5826> and [when] all her helpers

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יֵצְא֨וּ <WH3318> go forth מַלְאָכִ֤ים <WH4397> shall messengers מִלְּפָנַי֙ <WH6440> from me בַּצִּ֔ים <WH6716> in ships לְהַחֲרִ֖יד <WH2729> afraid אֶת־ <WH853> כּ֣וּשׁ <WH3568> Ethiopians בֶּ֑טַח <WH983> to make the careless וְהָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> become חַלְחָלָ֤ה <WH2479> and great pain בָהֶם֙ בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> shall come upon them as in the day מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> behold בָּאָֽה׃ <WH935> for lo it cometh ס

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <WH7673> to cease אֶת־ <WH853> הֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> I will also make the multitude מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by the hand נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon

ה֠וּא <WH1931> He וְעַמּ֤וֹ <WH5971> He and his people אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> for עָרִיצֵ֣י <WH6184> with him the terrible גוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the nations מֽוּבָאִ֖ים <WH935> shall be brought לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> to destroy הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְהֵרִ֤יקוּ <WH7324> and they shall draw חַרְבוֹתָם֙ <WH2719> their swords עַל־ <WH5921> against מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> against Egypt וּמָלְא֥וּ <WH4390> and fill אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land חָלָֽל׃ <WH2491> with the slain

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> And I will make יְאֹרִים֙ <WH2975> the rivers חָֽרָבָ֔ה <WH2724> dry וּמָכַרְתִּ֥י <WH4376> and sell אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand רָעִ֑ים <WH7451> of the wicked וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֞י <WH8074> waste אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> and I will make the land וּמְלֹאָהּ֙ <WH4393> and all that is therein בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand זָרִ֔ים <WH2114> of strangers אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> have spoken ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֨י <WH6> I will also destroy גִלּוּלִ֜ים <WH1544> the idols וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֤י <WH7673> to cease אֱלִילִים֙ <WH457> and I will cause [their] images מִנֹּ֔ף <WH5297> out of Noph וְנָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> and there shall be no more a prince מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and I will put יִרְאָ֖ה <WH3374> a fear בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִי֙ <WH8074> desolate אֶת־ <WH853> פַּתְר֔וֹס <WH6624> And I will make Pathros וְנָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> and will set אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> fire בְּצֹ֑עַן <WH6814> in Zoan וְעָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> and will execute שְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> judgments בְּנֹֽא׃ <WH4996> in No

וְשָׁפַכְתִּ֣י <WH8210> And I will pour חֲמָתִ֔י <WH2534> my fury עַל־ <WH5921> on סִ֖ין <WH5512> upon Sin מָע֣וֹז <WH4581> the strength מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <WH3772> and I will cut off אֶת־ <WH853> הֲמ֥וֹן <WH1995> the multitude נֹֽא׃ <WH4996> of No

וְנָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> And I will set אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> fire בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt ח֤וּל <WH2342> shall have great [תָּחִיל כ] (תָּחוּל֙ <WH2342> will writhe ק) סִ֔ין <WH5512> Sin וְנֹ֖א <WH4996> and No תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לְהִבָּקֵ֑עַ <WH1234> shall be rent asunder וְנֹ֖ף <WH5297> and Noph צָרֵ֥י <WH6862> [shall have] distresses יוֹמָֽם׃ <WH3119> daily

בַּח֥וּרֵי <WH970> The young men אָ֛וֶן <WH206> of Aven וּפִי־ בֶ֖סֶת <WH6364> and of Pibeseth בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּ֑לוּ <WH5307> shall fall וְהֵ֖נָּה <WH2007> into בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <WH7628> into captivity תֵלַֽכְנָה׃ <WH1980> will go

וּבִֽתְחַפְנְחֵס֙ <WH8471> At Tehaphnehes חָשַׂ֣ךְ <WH2821> will be dark הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> also the day בְּשִׁבְרִי־ <WH7665> when I shall break שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> מֹט֣וֹת <WH4133> there the yokes מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְנִשְׁבַּת־ <WH7673> shall cease בָּ֖הּ גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> and the pomp עֻזָּ֑הּ <WH5797> of her strength הִ֚יא <WH1931> in her עָנָ֣ן <WH6051> as for her a cloud יְכַסֶּ֔נָּה <WH3680> shall cover וּבְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1323> her and her daughters בַּשְּׁבִ֥י <WH7628> into captivity תֵלַֽכְנָה׃ <WH1980> will go

וְעָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> Thus will I execute שְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> judgments בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בְּאַחַ֤ת <WH259> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year בָּֽרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> in the first בְּשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> [month] in the seventh לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man אֶת־ <WH853> זְר֛וֹעַ <WH2220> the arm פַּרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt שָׁבָ֑רְתִּי <WH7665> I have broken וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not חֻ֠בְּשָׁה <WH2280> and lo it shall not be bound up לָתֵ֨ת <WH5414> for רְפֻא֜וֹת <WH7499> healing לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> to put חִתּ֛וּל <WH2848> a roller לְחָבְשָׁ֥הּ <WH2280> to bind לְחָזְקָ֖הּ <WH2388> it to make it strong לִתְפֹּ֥שׂ <WH8610> to hold בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> the sword ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> behold אֶל־ <WH413> I am against פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> Behold I [am] against Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <WH7665> and will break אֶת־ <WH853> זְרֹ֣עֹתָ֔יו <WH2220> his arms אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲזָקָ֖ה <WH2389> the strong וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנִּשְׁבָּ֑רֶת <WH7665> and that which was broken וְהִפַּלְתִּ֥י <WH5307> to fall אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> and I will cause the sword מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> out of his hand

וַהֲפִצוֹתִ֥י <WH6327> And I will scatter אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> the Egyptians בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> among the nations וְזֵרִיתִ֖ם <WH2219> and will disperse בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> them through the countries

וְחִזַּקְתִּ֗י <WH2388> And I will strengthen אֶת־ <WH853> זְרֹעוֹת֙ <WH2220> the arms מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and put אֶת־ <WH853> חַרְבִּ֖י <WH2719> my sword בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וְשָׁבַרְתִּי֙ <WH7665> but I will break אֶת־ <WH853> זְרֹע֣וֹת <WH2220> arms פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's וְנָאַ֛ק <WH5008> and he shall groan נַאֲק֥וֹת <WH5009> him with the groanings חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> of a deadly wounded לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וְהַחֲזַקְתִּ֗י <WH2388> But I will strengthen אֶת־ <WH853> זְרֹעוֹת֙ <WH2220> the arms מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וּזְרֹע֥וֹת <WH2220> and the arms פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh תִּפֹּ֑לְנָה <WH5307> shall fall down וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בְּתִתִּ֤י <WH5414> when I shall put חַרְבִּי֙ <WH2719> my sword בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְנָטָ֥ה <WH5186> and he shall stretch it out אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> against אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> upon the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַהֲפִצוֹתִ֤י <WH6327> And I will scatter אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> the Egyptians בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the nations וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <WH2219> and disperse אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בָּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> them among the countries וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס
